clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Access the Efficacy and Safety of Meloxicam in Patients With Osteoarthritis of the Knee
clinical_study.official_title: Open Study to Access the Efficacy and Safety of Meloxicam 7.5mg in Patients With Osteoarthritis of the Knee

brief_summary.textblock: To Access the Efficacy and Safety of Meloxicam 7.5mg once daily over a treatment period of 56 days

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pain on active movement assessed by a 100 mm visual analogue scale (100 mm, VAS)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 8 weeks after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Lequesne index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 8 weeks after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in physical examination (tenderness)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 8 weeks after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of significant change from baseline in status according endoscopy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 8 weeks after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of significant change from baseline in gastrointestinal (GI) symptoms score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 8 weeks after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of significant change from baseline in laboratory values
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, 8 weeks after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients with Adverse Events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 8 weeks after first drug administration

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of significant change from baseline in physical examination (swelling)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Osteoarthritis of the knee requiring the therapy with non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs)
Exclusion Criteria:
